notgamy82: bitrate is irrelevant when it comes to yify, he produces the best quality possible in the smallest size, you either trust him & are yify loyal or you don't. You say it won't cost him anything, errr...  it'll cost him the time it takes to check the bitrate & type it, frankly I'd rather he spend that time relaxing or encoding. joetwawa: yify achieves his legendary file size by omitting surround & focussing on picture quality. People who want DTS download MKV's. Files of this size aren't possible with surround & this picture quality.

YIFI is great video quality, but the audio is sub par.  I know that better audio would equal larger file, but to wait an extra 30 mins wouldn't kill anyone.  I've searched for the MKV version of this movie and it's slim pickings, with barely any seeders.  Even though the sound quality is poor, I still choose YIFI becasue it's trusted.
